description: Detects presence of a potentially xor encoded powershell command
author: Sami Ruohonen
Harish Segar
Tim Shelton
Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Vasiliy Burov
oscd.community
Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Suspicious XOR Encoded PowerShell Command
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll")) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:"Windows PowerShell") OR (Product:"PowerShell Core 6")) AND process.command_line.text:*bxor* AND process.command_line.text:(*ForEach* OR *for\(* OR *for\ * OR *\-join\ * OR *\-join'* OR *\-join\"* OR *\-join`* OR *\:\:Join* OR *\[char\]*))
